The _Template_ file is a combination of HTML code and groovy code blocks. The usage of eXo IDE gives the possibility to create and edit those files in editors.

h1. Create and Edit Template

To create a new template, do as follows:
* *Step 1:* Go to *New > Template* on the _Toolbar_; or select *File > New > Template* on the top menu. The editor will open a new empty file.
* *Step 2:* Add content and the code will be highlighted.
* *Step 3:* Save the file selecting *File > Save As* on  the top menu or clicking the *Save As* icon on the _Toolbar_. With template file _Outline Panel_ and autocomplete, but only in HTML tags by now, can be used.

!groovy_template.png|border=1!

*Illustration. Operations with templates*

h1. View properties

To view properties of the _Template_, click the *Show Properties* button on the right corner of the _Toolbar_.

h1. Preview ECM Template

To preview ECM Template you should do as follows:
* *Step 1:* Open saved earlier template file.
* *Step 2:* Click the *Show Preview* button on the _Toolbar_; or go to *Run > Show Preview* on top menu.
Template will be opened in the _Gadget Container_ of _Preview Tab_, as you can see at the illustration below:
